name: RENO-TAHOE AIRPORT AUTHORITY (RTAA)
description: Owns and operates both Reno-Tahoe International Airport and Reno-Stead Airport
sampleDescriptions: Public Law 118-63, FAA Reauthorization Act of 2024, Airport implementation related issues
